verses.verse: And it came to pass after many<WH7227> days<WH3117>, that the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came to Elijah<WH452> in the third<WH7992> year<WH8141>, saying<WH559>, Go<WH3212>, show<WH7200> yourself unto Ahab<WH256>; and I will send<WH5414> rain<WH4306> upon<WH6440> the earth<WH127>.
And Elijah<WH452> went<WH3212> to show<WH7200> himself unto Ahab<WH256>. And there was a severe<WH2389> famine<WH7458> in Samaria<WH8111>.
And Ahab<WH256> called<WH7121> Obadiah<WH5662>, which was the governor of his house<WH1004>. (Now Obadiah<WH5662> feared<WH3373> the Lord<WH3068> greatly<WH3966>:

For it was so<WH348>, when Jezebel cut off<WH3772> the prophets<WH5030> of the Lord<WH3068>, that Obadiah<WH5662> took<WH3947> a hundred<WH3967> prophets<WH5030>, and hid<WH2244> them by fifty<WH376> in a cave<WH4631>, and fed<WH3557> them with bread<WH3899> and water<WH4325>.)

And Ahab<WH256> said<WH559> unto Obadiah<WH5662>, Go<WH3212> into the land<WH776>, unto all fountains<WH4599> of water<WH4325>, and unto all brooks<WH5158>: perhaps<WH194> we may find<WH4672> grass<WH2682> to save<WH2421> the horses<WH5483> and mules<WH6505> alive<WH2421>, that we lose<WH3772> not all the animals<WH929>.

So they divided<WH2505> the land<WH776> between them to pass throughout<WH5674> it<WH256>: Ahab went<WH1980> one<WH259> way<WH1870> by himself<WH5662>, and Obadiah went<WH1980> another<WH259> way by himself<WH1870>.

And as Obadiah<WH5662> was in the way<WH1870>, behold<WH452>, Elijah met<WH7125> him<WH5234>: and he knew him<WH5307>, and fell on his face<WH6440>, and said<WH559>, Are you that my lord<WH113> Elijah<WH452>?
And he answered<WH559> him<WH3212>, I am: go, tell<WH559> your lord<WH113>, Behold<WH452>, Elijah is here.
And he said<WH559>, What have I sinned<WH2398>, that you would deliver<WH5414> your servant<WH5650> into the hand<WH3027> of Ahab<WH256>, to kill me<WH4191>?

As the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> lives<WH2416>, there is no<WH3426> nation<WH1471> or kingdom<WH4467>, where<WH834> my lord<WH113> has not sent<WH7971> to seek<WH1245> you<WH559>: and when they said, He is not there<WH7650>; he took an oath of the kingdom<WH4467> and nation<WH1471>, that they found you not<WH4672>.
And now you say<WH559>, Go<WH3212>, tell<WH559> your lord<WH113>, Behold<WH452>, Elijah is here.

And it shall come to pass<WH3212>, as soon as I am gone from you<WH7307>, that the Spirit of the Lord<WH3068> shall carry<WH5375> you where I know<WH3045> not<WH935>; and so when I come and tell<WH5046> Ahab<WH256>, and he cannot find<WH4672> you<WH2026>, he shall kill me<WH5650>: but I your servant fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> from my youth<WH5271>.

Was it not told<WH5046> my lord<WH113> what I did<WH6213> when Jezebel<WH348> killed<WH2026> the prophets<WH5030> of the Lord<WH3068>, how I hid<WH2244> a hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> of the Lord<WH3068>'s prophets<WH5030> by fifty<WH2572> in a cave<WH4631>, and fed<WH3557> them with bread<WH3899> and water<WH4325>?
And now you say<WH559>, Go<WH3212>, tell<WH559> your lord<WH113>, Behold<WH452>, Elijah is here<WH2026>: and he shall kill me.
And Elijah<WH452> said<WH559>, As the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> lives<WH2416>, before<WH6440> whom I stand<WH5975>, I will surely show<WH7200> myself unto him to day<WH3117>.
So Obadiah<WH5662> went<WH3212> to meet<WH7125> Ahab<WH256>, and told<WH5046> him<WH256>: and Ahab went<WH3212> to meet<WH7125> Elijah<WH452>.
And it came to pass<WH256>, when Ahab saw<WH7200> Elijah<WH452>, that Ahab<WH256> said<WH559> unto him<WH5916>, Are you he that troubles Israel<WH3478>?

And he answered<WH559>, I have not troubled<WH5916> Israel<WH3478>; but you<WH1>, and your father's house<WH1004>, in that you have forsaken<WH5800> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068>, and you have followed<WH3212> Baalim<WH1168>.

Now therefore send<WH7971>, and gather<WH6908> to me all Israel<WH3478> unto mountain<WH2022> Carmel<WH3760>, and the prophets<WH5030> of Baal<WH1168> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>, and the prophets<WH5030> of the groves<WH842> four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>, which eat<WH398> at Jezebel<WH348>'s table<WH7979>.
So Ahab<WH256> sent<WH7971> unto all the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and gathered<WH6908> the prophets<WH5030> together<WH6908> unto mountain<WH2022> Carmel<WH3760>.

And Elijah<WH452> came<WH5066> unto all the people<WH5971>, and said<WH559>, How long<WH5921> hesitate<WH6452> you between two<WH8147> opinions<WH5587>? if the Lord<WH3068> be God<WH430>, follow him<WH1168>: but if Baal, then follow<WH3212> him<WH5971>. And the people answered<WH6030> him not a word<WH1697>.

Then said<WH559> Elijah<WH452> unto the people<WH5971>, I<WH3498>, even I only, remain a prophet<WH5030> of the Lord<WH3068>; but Baal<WH1168>'s prophets<WH5030> are four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> men<WH376>.

Let them therefore give<WH5414> us two<WH8147> bullocks<WH6499>; and let them choose<WH977> one<WH259> bullock<WH6499> for themselves<WH5408>, and cut it in pieces, and lay<WH7760> it on wood<WH6086>, and put<WH7760> no fire<WH784> under<WH6213>: and I will dress the other<WH259> bullock<WH6499>, and lay<WH5414> it on wood<WH6086>, and put<WH7760> no fire under<WH784>:

And call<WH7121> you on the name<WH8034> of your gods<WH430>, and I will call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068>: and the God<WH430> that answers<WH6030> by fire<WH784>, let him be God<WH430>. And all the people<WH5971> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, It is well<WH2896> spoken<WH1697>.

And Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> unto the prophets<WH5030> of Baal<WH1168>, Choose<WH977> you one<WH259> bullock<WH6499> for yourselves<WH6213>, and dress it first<WH7223>; for you are many<WH7227>; and call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of your gods<WH430>, but put<WH7760> no fire under<WH784>.

And they took<WH3947> the bullock<WH6499> which was given<WH5414> them<WH6213>, and they dressed it<WH7121>, and called on the name<WH8034> of Baal<WH1168> from morning<WH1242> even until noon<WH6672>, saying<WH559>, O Baal<WH1168>, hear<WH6030> us<WH369>. But there was no voice<WH6963>, nor any that answered<WH6030>. And they leaped<WH6452> upon the altar<WH4196> which was made<WH6213>.

And it came to pass at noon<WH6672>, that Elijah<WH452> mocked<WH2048> them<WH559>, and said, Cry<WH7121> aloud<WH1419>: for he is a god<WH430>; either he is talking<WH7879>, or he is pursuing<WH7873>, or he is in a journey<WH1870>, or perhaps<WH194> he sleeps<WH3463>, and must be awaked<WH3364>.
And they cried<WH7121> aloud<WH6963>, and cut<WH1413> themselves after their manner<WH4941> with knives<WH2719> and lancets<WH7420>, until the blood<WH1818> gushed out upon them<WH8210>.

And it came to pass<WH6672>, when midday was past<WH5674>, and they prophesied<WH5012> until the time of the offering<WH5927> of the evening sacrifice<WH4503>, that there was neither voice<WH6963>, nor any to answer<WH6030>, nor any that regarded<WH7182>.

And Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> unto all the people<WH5971>, Come near<WH5066> unto me<WH5971>. And all the people came near<WH5066> unto him<WH7495>. And he repaired the altar<WH4196> of the Lord<WH3068> that was broken down<WH2040>.

And Elijah<WH452> took<WH3947> twelve<WH8147> stones<WH68>, according to the number<WH4557> of the tribes<WH7626> of the sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290>, unto whom the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH559>, saying, Israel<WH3478> shall be your name<WH8034>:

And with the stones<WH68> he built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> in the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068>: and he made<WH6213> a trench<WH8585> about<WH5439> the altar<WH4196>, as great as would contain<WH1004> two measures<WH5429> of seed<WH2233>.

And he put<WH6186> the wood<WH6086> in order<WH6186>, and cut<WH5408> the bullock<WH6499> in pieces<WH7760>, and laid him on the wood<WH6086>, and said<WH559>, Fill<WH4390> four<WH702> barrels<WH3537> with water<WH4325>, and pour<WH3332> it on the burnt sacrifice<WH5930>, and on the wood<WH6086>.
And he said<WH559>, Do it the second time<WH8138>. And they did it the second time<WH8138>. And he said<WH559>, Do it the third time<WH8027>. And they did it the third time<WH8027>.
And the water<WH4325> ran<WH3212> round about<WH5439> the altar<WH4196>; and he filled<WH4390> the trench<WH8585> also with water<WH4325>.

And it came to pass at the time of the offering<WH5927> of the evening sacrifice<WH4503>, that Elijah<WH452> the prophet<WH5030> came near<WH5066>, and said<WH559>, Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Abraham<WH85>, Isaac<WH3327>, and of Israel<WH3478>, let it be known<WH3045> this day<WH3117> that you are God<WH430> in Israel<WH3478>, and that I am your servant<WH5650>, and that I have done<WH6213> all these things at your word<WH1697>.

Hear<WH6030> me<WH3068>, O Lord, hear<WH6030> me<WH5971>, that this people may know<WH3045> that you are the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430>, and that you have turned<WH5437> their heart<WH3820> back<WH5437> again<WH322>.

Then the fire<WH784> of the Lord<WH3068> fell<WH5307>, and consumed<WH398> the burnt sacrifice<WH5930>, and the wood<WH6086>, and the stones<WH68>, and the dust<WH6083>, and licked up<WH3897> the water<WH4325> that was in the trench<WH8585>.
And when all the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> it<WH5307>, they fell on their faces<WH6440>: and they said<WH559>, The Lord<WH3068>, he is the God<WH430>; the Lord<WH3068>, he is the God<WH430>.

And Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> unto them<WH8610>, Take the prophets<WH5030> of Baal<WH1168>; let not one<WH376> of them escape<WH4422>. And they took<WH8610> them<WH452>: and Elijah brought them down<WH3381> to the brook<WH5158> Kishon<WH7028>, and killed them there<WH7819>.
And Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> unto Ahab<WH256>, Get you up<WH5927>, eat<WH398> and drink<WH8354>; for there is a sound<WH6963> of abundance<WH1995> of rain<WH1653>.

So Ahab<WH256> went up<WH5927> to eat<WH398> and to drink<WH8354>. And Elijah<WH452> went up<WH5927> to the top<WH7218> of Carmel<WH3760>; and he cast himself down<WH1457> upon the earth<WH776>, and put<WH7760> his face<WH6440> between his knees<WH1290>,

And it came to pass at the seventh time<WH7637>, that he said<WH559>, Behold<WH5927>, there arises a little<WH6996> cloud<WH5645> out of the sea<WH3220>, like a man<WH376>'s hand<WH3709>. And he said<WH559>, Go up<WH5927>, say<WH559> unto Ahab<WH256>, Prepare<WH631> your chariot<WH3381>, and get you down, that the rain<WH1653> stop you not<WH6113>.

And it came to pass in the mean while<WH3541>, that the heaven<WH8064> was black<WH6937> with clouds<WH5645> and wind<WH7307>, and there was a great<WH1419> rain<WH1653>. And Ahab<WH256> rode<WH7392>, and went<WH3212> to Jezreel<WH3157>.
